listitem.para: (12. May 2001) First packaged version of CDK can be downloaded from the CDK project pages on sourceforge (http://sourceforge.net/projects/cdk).
(14. Mar. 2001) First CDK-based port of JChemPaint can be found in the JChemPaint CVS repository (http://sourceforge.net/projects/jchempaint) under its own JCPCDK subtree.
(12. Feb. 2001) The CDK now has its own SourceForge project (http://sourceforge.net/projects/cdk)
(11. Feb. 2001) The 2D chemical editor JChemPaint, just released as version 1.0, will now be ported to the CDK.
(06. Feb. 2001) New page design based on Norm Walsh's website dtd
